metadata.title: CVE-2024-50098 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: ufs: core: Set SDEV_OFFLINE when UFS is shut downThere is a history of deadlock if reboot is performed at the beginningof booting. SDEV_QUIESCE was set for all LU's scsi_devices by UFSshutdown, and at that time the audio driver was waiting onblk_mq_submit_bio() holding a mutex_lock while reading the fw binary.After that, a deadlock issue occurred while audio driver shutdown waswaiting for mutex_unlock of blk_mq_submit_bio(). To solve this, setSDEV_OFFLINE for all LUs except WLUN, so that any I/O that comes downafter a UFS shutdown will return an error.[   31.907781]I[0:      swapper/0:    0]        1
